desc:
Active: Arctic Blast - Emits a freezing wave that deals 200 magical damage to enemies and slows their movement by -40% for 4.0 seconds.
Passive: Freezing Aura - Reduces the attack speed of all enemies in a 900 radius.

Multiple instances of Freezing Aura do not stack.
notes:
The wave extends at a speed of 350 to a max size of 900.
The Arctic Blast follows its caster.
attrib:
+ 30 Intelligence
+ 15 Armor
AURA ATTACK SLOW: 45
BLAST DAMAGE: 200
BLAST MOVEMENT SLOW: 40%
BLAST SLOW DURATION: 4
BLAST RADIUS: 900
lore: Said to have belonged to a goddess, today it retains much of its former power.
